summary: A wild teenage girl orchestrates a romance between her nanny and her father, who is a recovering addict.
cast: Kristen Wiig|Guy Pearce|Hailee Steinfeld|Jennifer Jason Leigh|Sami Gayle|Christine Lahti|Nick Nolte|Lauren Swinney|Jeff Pope|Joel K. Berger|Don Brady|Becki Davis|Peggy Walton-Walker|Douglas M. Griffin|Tony Bentley|Brett Roedel|Brian Roedel|Casey Hendershot|Grant Case|Emily D. Haley|Darryl Harvey|Joseph Jackson|Ann Mahoney|David Stickler
title: Hateship Loveship
